ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Received"), FS_Fees__c <> 0, Override_VR__c = False, OR( Marketer_UW__c = "The Hartford", Marketer_UW__c = "CNA", Marketer_UW__c = "TRAVELERS CAS INS CO OF AMER", Marketer_UW__c = "Employer's Insurance", Marketer_UW__c = "Chubb", Marketer_UW__c ="AmTrust", Marketer_UW__c ="HISCOX INSURANCE COMPANY INC." ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: We cannot charge an admin fee on when we are directly appointed by the carrier: Hartford, CNA, Travelers, Employers, Chubb, AMTrust, Hiscox
